    <Carousel 
        itemsToShow={2}
        onNextStart={(currentItem,nextItem) => alert(JSON.stringify(currentItem) + `\n` + JSON.stringify(nextItem))}

    <Item someProp="cool1">1</Item>
    <Item someProp="cool2">2</Item>
    <Item someProp="cool3">3</Item>
    <Item someProp="cool4">4</Item>
    <Item someProp="cool5">5</Item>
    <Item someProp="cool6">6</Item>
    </Carousel>
</Playground>
